author: Bollywood Hungama
title: Check out: Kriti Sanon follows denim on denim trend on Cineblitz cover - Bollywood Hungama
text:
Home » News » Features » Check out: Kriti Sanon follows denim on denim trend on Cineblitz cover Check out: Kriti Sanon follows denim on denim trend on Cineblitz cover Bollywood Hungama News Network Feb 2, 2017 - 11:48 hrs IST 0 0 
Kriti Sanon is making waves this New Year on her first cover of CineBlitz magazine February 2017 issue. The special Valentine’s issue features Kriti Sanon as a stylish nerd. 
Kriti Sanon looks chic and following the denim on denim trend with a denim shirt with shorts from Lawman Pg3 and net stockings. Rocking a pair of glasses, she has quoted saying, “I am the best girlfriend.” 
On the work front, Kriti will be next seen in Raabta opposite Sushant Singh Rajput . The film is directed by Dinesh Vijan and produced by Homi Adajania. She will also be seen in Bareilly Ki Barfi alongside Ayushmann Khurrana and Rajkummar Rao.
